item.title: VST
item.description: score:74 Chances: Vistra Corp. is making investments to strengthen its existing operations Vistra Corp. is well positioned to outperform the market, as it exhibits above-average growth in financials Investors might want to consider buying stocks outside of technology heading into 2024 Risks: The worst result, after buying shares in a company, would be if you lose all the money you put in Some stocks are trading at solid valuations at a time when much of the market is rather overheated Score:74 chances characters count - risks characters count = 74

item.title: SEDG
item.description: score:-56 Chances: The Fed meeting spurred confidence in lower inflation and lower interest rates in 2024. Analysts are expecting solar stocks to rebound on increased solar panel installations in 2024. Risks: Solar industry growth in Europe has decelerated due to surplus inventories and reduced demand in crucial markets.
